description: Oral employment contract for more than one year
facts: Mike orally agreed to employ Nancy for a two-year period as CFO
The salary was set at $150,000 per year
No written employment contract was created
asp_facts: contract(c7). subject_matter(c7, employment). parties(c7, mike, nancy). duration_months(c7, 24). has_writing(c7, no). salary_annual(c7, 150000). has_consideration(c7, yes). has_mutual_assent(c7, yes).
question: Is this contract enforceable under the Statute of Frauds?
rationale: Contracts that cannot be performed within one year from the date of making must be in writing under the Statute of Frauds. A two-year employment contract falls under this requirement.
